Product Grid Section.Layout: Grid layout with multiple product cards arranged in rows and columns. The grid adjusts to different screen sizes using responsive design.
Product Grid Section.Design: Clean and modern design with emphasis on product imagery and key details. Each product card uses a hover effect to enhance user interaction.

Key Elements.Section Heading: Bold section title with an optional 'Show more' link to view additional products.
Key Elements.Product Card: Each card includes an image, product name, price, and any discount or sale notifications.
Key Elements.Hover Effect: Images zoom slightly on hover, adding a dynamic feel.
Key Elements.Discount Badge: Products on sale feature a prominent badge to attract attention.

Product Grid Section.Use Cases: Ideal for e-commerce websites showcasing products, special deals, and promotions. Suitable for highlighting featured or selected items.
